CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 5 For the PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend film ( in a weight ratio of 1 : 3 , spin - coated from ODCB solutions ) , hole mobility ( μ hole ) of 1.14 × 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 and electron mobility ( μ e ) of 2.7 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 were obtained.

Let's think step by step.

1. PSFDTBT - This is a "Material Name" as it is a polymer used in the blend film.
2. PC71BM - This is also a "Material Name" as it is a fullerene derivative used in the blend film.
3. ODCB - This is a "Material Name" as it is a solvent used to create the solutions for spin-coating the blend film.

Therefore, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are PSFDTBT, PC71BM, and ODCB.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PSFDTBT
2. PC71BM
3. ODCB

These are the entities that clearly refer to Material Names in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 5 For the PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend film ( in a weight ratio of 1 : 3 , spin - coated from ODCB solutions ) , hole mobility ( μ hole ) of 1.14 × 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 and electron mobility ( μ e ) of 2.7 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 were obtained.

Let's think step by step.

1. PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend film
2. weight ratio
3. 1 (in the weight ratio of 1 : 3)
4. 3 (in the weight ratio of 1 : 3)
5. hole mobility (μ hole)
6. 1.14 × 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 (hole mobility value)
7. electron mobility (μ e)
8. 2.7 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 (electron mobility value)

These eight entities can be considered as "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph. They are either physical properties or characteristics of the materials mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. hole mobility (μ hole)
2. 1.14 × 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 (hole mobility value)
3. electron mobility (μ e)
4. 2.7 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 (electron mobility value)

These four entities are the ones that clearly refer to Material Properties in the given paragraph. They are physical properties of the PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend film.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| hole mobility (μ hole) |
| 1.14 × 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 (hole mobility value) |
| electron mobility (μ e) |
| 2.7 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 (electron mobility value) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 5 For the PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend film ( in a weight ratio of 1 : 3 , spin - coated from ODCB solutions ) , hole mobility ( μ hole ) of 1.14 × 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 and electron mobility ( μ e ) of 2.7 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 were obtained.

Let's think step by step.

1. The first "Property Value" entity is "1.14 × 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1", which is the value of the hole mobility (μ hole) of the PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend film.
2. The second "Property Value" entity is "2.7 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1", which is the value of the electron mobility (μ e) of the PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend film.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "1.14 × 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1" and "2.7 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. "1.14 × 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1" (value of hole mobility of the PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend film)
2. "2.7 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1" (value of electron mobility of the PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend film)

These are the relevant entities that clearly refer to the Value of Material Property in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
